text: Gregg Leakes net worth: Gregg Leakes is an American real estate investor and consultant who has a net worth of $4 million. Gregg Leakes acquired that net worth thanks to more than twenty years experience investing in the real estate market of Atlanta, Georgia. Gregg Leakes has gained fame more recently thanks to his relationship with reality television starlet Nene Leakes. Nene Leakes was one of the stars of Bravo's reality TV series The Real Housewives of Atlanta. Gregg and Nene have had an on-again-off-again relationship for many years. Gregg and Nene met in 1996 while she was working as a stripper in Atlanta. They were married the first time around from 1997 – to 2011. They have two sons together. They have spent some time separated but in January 2013, Nene confirmed with her fans that she and Gregg were engaged to be re-married. The second marriage took place on June 22, 2013 in Atlanta. Their wedding was the subject of a special seven-episode documentary called "I Dream of NeNe: The Wedding" that aired on the Bravo network. Gregg Leakes was born and raised in Brooklyn, NY. He has several children from a previous relationship as do Nene. Leakes starred in The Real Housewives of Atlanta from 2008 to 2013. He has also appeared in episodes of the TV series Watch What Happens: Live, Wendy: The Wendy Williams Show, The Arsenio Hall Show, Bethenny, and Masterchef.
